description: This is the script for the story portion of the game and will also serve as the instruction manual on how to display each scene

lines.speaker: Default
lines.line: TEXT

lines.speaker: Default
lines.line: TEXT 2

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Time to get up already…?

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: At least this is the last day before we get a couple days to relax.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: I’m beat... I feel like a rudely-revived corpse.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Through glazed eyes, I make out the familiar faces of my cohort.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: They’re also all exhausted, go figure.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Some turn back over in their bunk to catch 5 more minutes of sleep,

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Some begrudgingly sit up and stretch their muscles,

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: A couple comrades laugh to themselves.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: But we are all preparing ourselves for today, the big day.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Exam day.

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: Mornin' Ender.
I looked up and saw Petra sitting up in the bunk across from me.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Good morning, Petra.

lines.speaker: Petra
lines.line: Ready for today?

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Ready as I'll ever be.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: Just as she finished that thought, we heard the loud stomping of a certain someone's boots from outside.

lines.speaker: Ender
lines.line: None other than Sergeant Dap marched into our sleeping quarters and stood vigilantly by the door. His voice bellowed in the small space.

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: UP! UP! UP!

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: A robotic storage unit rolled into the room and parked next to him.

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: LET'S GET THE DAY STARTED RECRUITS.

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: Today, we have spcial team-colored suits.

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: Put your suit on, go to the cafeteria, eat and meet back here.

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: You have exactly...

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: He looked at his watch and tapped on it with his finger.

lines.speaker: Sgt. Dap
lines.line: ... 58 minutes and 24 seconds...

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: He turned around and walked calmly ou of the room

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: The room's energy rose sharply as everyone clambered about.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: Everyone lined up in front of the storage unit to collect their suit.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: These are some high tech suits for sure.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: They have our team's logo on the left shoulder- a dragon.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: This suit was not so different from pilot suits we already had.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: Though they do look a lot better.

lines.speaker: Ender (Thinking)
lines.line: I put the suit on and went to get some breakfast.

line: Well this is surprising.
The cafeteria is serving scrambled eggs, sausage, pancakes, the works.
They're totally spoiling us.
I sat with the rest of my team at our usual table.
So how is everyone feeling?
I'm feeling pretty confident.
Me too, I don't want to squander this. Not now.
I wish I could be as confident as you guys.
There's always that part of me that worries.
If I had to put money on someone succeeding, you're the one, Ender.
The table gave an encouraging laugh.
I laughed too.
They were right: all my life I've done nothing but worry.
All my life I have been picked on.
Here, I fit in. Of all places, Battle School.
I smiled and finished my breakfast.
The cafeteria was the loudest I've heard it since I first got here.
All the teams at the other tables are in good spirit.
Today was the day that we would all compete for spots in command school.
Years ago, an alien mothership appeared in our Solar system.
It arrived on Earth and without warning...
Attacked us.
The onslaught was unrelenting.
We called them the 'Formic' species and they wreaked havoc across the globe.
A brave team of fighter jet pilots were able to destroy the mothership.
They worked together to fly a nuclear warhead into the ship.
The pilots lost their lives to defend humanity.
With the world in widespread panic, a program to fight the Formic forces was founded.
The program invited young teens in particular to join them.
Their belief was that the young, bright minds of today would save those of tomorrow.
